title: Solve the Open Hand Temple Murders

content: We've been asked to look into the deaths of Father Lorgan and Brlgor at the Open Hand Temple. Sister Yannis, the temple's rector, believes Brulgor's been blamed. for the crime too hastily by investigator Valeria. By speaking with the dead, we learned that a dwarf clad in red killed both Father Lorgan and Brilogr. We need hard proof to exonerate Brilgor, however, and should check out the murder scene.
